replies.bodyText: my bad, I had @Value in mind when I typed @Data
replies.author: pvpurcarcosmin

timeline.bodyText:
we have a unique constraint on AD_Reference_ID and Value ..
i think for that reason, the lookup should be only by AD_Reference_ID and Value AFAIS. and "name" should not be part of the key.
timeline.author: metas-ts

replies.bodyText: didn't saw it, as it is not in the AD_Index_Table, I'll drop mine and query only after Reference_ID and Value.
replies.author: pvpurcarcosmin

timeline.bodyText: can we still have multiple bookings per day? or don't we (currently) need/want this?
timeline.author: metas-ts

replies.bodyText: we can, we dropped the unique constraint when we moved from the exportTime endpoint to the getTeamBookedTime  one ( the one that provides also ids for the time records ) .
replies.author: pvpurcarcosmin

timeline.bodyText: do you have an index on S_IssueLabel.S_Issue_ID ?
timeline.author: metas-ts

timeline.bodyText:
see org.adempiere.ad.service.IADReferenceDAO.ADRefListItem.
might be what u want.
also pls note that usually, for names we use ITranslatableString instead of plain Strings.
